AbortMultipartUpload.name: AbortMultipartUpload
AbortMultipartUpload.description: Aborts a multipart upload identified by the upload ID

AbortVaultLock.name: AbortVaultLock
AbortVaultLock.description: Aborts the vault locking process if the vault lock is not in the Locked state

AddTagsToVault.name: AddTagsToVault
AddTagsToVault.description: Adds the specified tags to a vault

CreateVault.name: CreateVault
CreateVault.description: Creates a new vault with the specified name

DeleteArchive.name: DeleteArchive
DeleteArchive.description: Deletes an archive from a vault

DeleteVaultAccessPolicy.name: DeleteVaultAccessPolicy
DeleteVaultAccessPolicy.description: Deletes the access policy associated with the specified vault

DeleteVaultNotifications.name: DeleteVaultNotifications
DeleteVaultNotifications.description: Deletes the notification configuration set for a vault

DescribeJob.name: DescribeJob
DescribeJob.description: Returns information about a job you previously initiated

GetDataRetrievalPolicy.name: GetDataRetrievalPolicy
GetDataRetrievalPolicy.description:
Returns the current data retrieval policy for the account and region specified in
                                                the GET request

GetJobOutput.name: GetJobOutput
GetJobOutput.description: Downloads the output of the job you initiated

GetVaultAccessPolicy.name: GetVaultAccessPolicy
GetVaultAccessPolicy.description: Retrieves the access-policy subresource set on the vault

GetVaultLock.name: GetVaultLock
GetVaultLock.description: Retrieves attributes from the lock-policy subresource set on the specified vault

GetVaultNotifications.name: GetVaultNotifications
GetVaultNotifications.description: Retrieves the notification-configuration subresource set on the vault

InitiateJob.name: InitiateJob
InitiateJob.description: Initiates a job of the specified type

ListJobs.name: ListJobs
ListJobs.description: Lists jobs for a vault that are in-progress and jobs that have recently finished

ListMultipartUploads.name: ListMultipartUploads
ListMultipartUploads.description: Lists in-progress multipart uploads for the specified vault

ListParts.name: ListParts
ListParts.description: Lists the parts of an archive that have been uploaded in a specific multipart upload

ListProvisionedCapacity.name: ListProvisionedCapacity
ListProvisionedCapacity.description: This operation lists the provisioned capacity for the specified AWS account.

ListTagsForVault.name: ListTagsForVault
ListTagsForVault.description: Lists all the tags attached to a vault

PurchaseProvisionedCapacity.name: PurchaseProvisionedCapacity
PurchaseProvisionedCapacity.description: This operation purchases a provisioned capacity unit for an AWS account.

RemoveTagsFromVault.name: RemoveTagsFromVault
RemoveTagsFromVault.description: Removes one or more tags from the set of tags attached to a vault

SetDataRetrievalPolicy.name: SetDataRetrievalPolicy
SetDataRetrievalPolicy.description: Sets and then enacts a data retrieval policy in the region specified in the PUT request

SetVaultAccessPolicy.name: SetVaultAccessPolicy
SetVaultAccessPolicy.description: Configures an access policy for a vault and will overwrite an existing policy

UploadArchive.name: UploadArchive
UploadArchive.description: Adds an archive to a vault

UploadMultipartPart.name: UploadMultipartPart
UploadMultipartPart.description: Uploads a part of an archive
